**[Recall Knowledge - Construct](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)): DC 19 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14 [Sicklehand Construct](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1603) **Source** [Pathfinder #169: Kindled Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=94) pg. 41 **Perception** +6; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23) **Languages** **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +7, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +5 **Str** +1 **Dex** +3 **Con** +1 **Int** -5 **Wis** +0 **Cha** -5 **Items** [wooden sickles](/Weapons.aspx?ID=9) (2) --- **AC** 16 **Fort** +5 **Ref** +9 **Will** +4 **HP** 15 **Immunities** bleed, [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9), [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10), [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) attacks, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) **Weaknesses** [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) 3 **Critical Vulnerability** A critical hit damages the construct's controls, making it [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) until repaired. Additional critical hits increase this value, up to clumsy 4.
**Ridden Construct** The construct is piloted by a [leaf leshy](/Monsters.aspx?ID=279), who can be targeted separately but has greater cover. The leshy can't take actions of their own while inside the construct, other than to leave it, which takes 1 minute. --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** wooden sickle +8 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)), **Damage** 1d4+1 slashing **Menacing Sickles** The construct deals an additional 1d4 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) or [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31) creatures.
name: Sicklehand Construct
